mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.HIT , B.REG_ID , B.REG_DTTM , FILE_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NM , FILE_DIR FROM ks_board_activity B LEFT JOIN KS_FILE F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND B.BOARD_TYPE = F.BOARD_TYPE AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND B.BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType}
